column5: This is actually 2 rooms private bathroom in between. Ideal for families, allows parental privacy but close enough to monitor kids. Kids room has bunk beds, youth bed, a small rolling crib. Common areas include a play/game room, kitchen, breakfast nook, back yard. We have a small pool table, a foos ball table, a game consol, play area for children with toys that appeal to girls & boys. Listed rate includes city and county taxes. FYI Airbnb assess state taxes on top of listed price.
